## removeTracker() function

Removes a tracker given its namespace

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function removeTracker(trackerNamespace: string): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  trackerNamespace | string | Tracker namespace |
